__e: As I recall, she couldn't wait to get away from here.
My God, I'm so excited to leave, I can't even tell you.
You were in such a hurry to leave this morning, you forgot your laptop, so I just figured I'd drop it off on my way to work.
I never take it, but I was in a hurry to get home, you know? I--
An now she can't wait for me to fall for someone else, but every time I look at her...
I know you're anxious to get home so just stop by the office when it's convenient and we'll finish up.
